name: Toy Sonigui World DEMO
description:
A classic platformer made by an indie developer, but is a demo now!!!

Setting: One of the four islands on paradise archipelago.

Story: for some strange reason Toy sonigui goes to the paradise archipelago and aliens come to the Teacup island and Toy sonigui desides to stop the plans of the aliens before they do anithing bad.

plz dont die!,There's a bug that crashes the game if you do
